TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `CommandName` 单击控件中的 "更新" 按钮 (其属性设置为 "Update" ) 的按钮时，控件将引发事件，但在 控件更新记录后。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 这使您可以提供一个事件处理程序，以便在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如检查更新操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理程序，该处理程序允许您确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受更新操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用 属性可确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置属性，指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常 。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果需要访问已更新记录的键字段值，请使用 属性。If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 可以分别使用和属性访问原始的和更新的非键字段 值 。The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the and properties, respectively. 默认情况下，该 控件返回到 更新操作后由属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 若要使 控件处于编辑模式，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 传递给事件的事件处理程序的对象 来确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the update operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception is raised, use for this parameter.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||参数中包含的对象 `e` 。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为 `false` 。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为 `false` 。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 获取受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the update operation.

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定受更新操作影响的行数。Use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the update operation. 此值通常用于验证是否更新了相应的行数。This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定受更新操作影响的行数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of rows affected by an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 一个 ，表示更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 更新操作过程中引发的任何) ，请使用属性来确定异常 (。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且您决定在事件处理程序中处理异常，请确保将 属性设置为 `true` ; 否则，异常将传递到调用堆栈上的下一方法以进行处理。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在更新操作过程中引发异常时，请使用 属性指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则异常将被视为已处理，并且不会在调用堆栈中进一步传递。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack. 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则异常将传递到调用堆栈上的下一个方法进行处理。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. 若要确定引发的异常，请使用 属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作完成后 控件是否仍保持在编辑模式下。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 如果在更新操作之后仍处于编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，该 控件返回到 更新操作后由属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 使用 属性指定 控件是否应保持在编辑模式下。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in edit mode. 若要使 控件处于编辑模式，请将此属性设置为 `true` 。To keep the control in edit mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 如果希望在特定的情况下重写默认模式，则应使用此属性。This property should be used if you want to override the default mode at a specific occasion. 如果 控件在默认情况下需要保持编辑模式，请改为设置 属性。If the control needs to remain in edit mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性 在更新操作后使控件处于编辑模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode after an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，其中包含被更新记录的键字段名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 一个 ，包含被更新记录的键字段名称/值对字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问已更新记录的键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. 例如，你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器 直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问已更新记录的键字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 一个 ，包含被更新记录的新字段名称/值对字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问已更新记录的新字段值。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated record. 例如，你可以使用这些值来记录已更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式，还可以使用对象的索引器 直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问用户为已更新记录的非键字段输入的新值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
